used for output to XML (e.g. in BXA100 step 12)

07.12.2005 JJ SCR9615 "new"button hadnling

on 2.1.2004 SCR4923 changed by Jin

07.04.2003 JJ SCR3295 -added zoom on "letter text" fields to new entry program

09.08.2002 JJ SCR1893 changed all language code screen pictures to upper case
27.05.2002 JJ SCR1327 RTF blobs read into memo fields using RTRIM function

14.02.2002 JJ SCR821 moved language validation "new/modify client"
from RM to RS
For Modify Client
N:New Client
M:Modify Client
D: Delete
Fields On Screen
>>> Buttons >>>
* ZV - Differance from the Spec. : agreed with Mr. den oudsten
1. There is no <New language> button
- On the language field the user can select any language from the
languge table - if there is text for that language - it will be
retrieved by the task 'Get letter text'.
and the user can modify that text
If there is no text for the selected language -
the user can type text for the selected language and save it
using the <OK> button.
2. There is no <Modify Client> button
Instead - in the client exeptions table on the bottom of the screen
I have put a small button on the line of a client
when using this button - the user will get the New/Modify Client scree
Fields On Screen
>>> Buttons >>>
*see remarks on TP of task 'Online Screen'
same as there - I use the languge field to select a language
and if there is text to that language - it will be retrieved by the
sub-task 'Get letter text' - If not - the user can use the screen to
enter another language text. ZV
